fabricDetails.description:
A robust and versatile plain fabric with a soft, slightly raised, textured finish. Combining the comfort of a cotton-linen blend with the practicality of polyester.
Composition: 85% Polyester 12% Cotton 3% Linen

specs.HoverValue: Traditional hardwood frame. Note: the 4 seater sofa comes split in half for ease of access.
specs.Label: Frame
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Frame
specs.Value: Traditional hardwood frame. Note: the 4 seater sofa comes split in half for ease of access.

specs.HoverValue: Webbed back with luxury duck feather cushions.
specs.Label: Back
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Back
specs.Value: Webbed back with luxury duck feather cushions.

specs.HoverValue: Quallofil Blue Eco fibre seat cushions with duck feather back cushions (feather wrap seat cushions also available).
specs.Label: Cushions
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Cushions
specs.Value: Quallofil Blue Eco fibre seat cushions with duck feather back cushions (feather wrap seat cushions also available).

specs.HoverValue: Oak feet in a variety of stains and finishes. Download specifications PDF to see feet options.
specs.Label: Feet
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Feet
specs.Value: Oak feet in a variety of stains and finishes. Download specifications PDF to see feet options.

specs.HoverValue: There are no scatters supplied as standard on this size.
specs.Label: Scatters
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Scatters
specs.Value: There are no scatters supplied as standard on this size.

specs.HoverValue: Removeable legs for easy access. Please enquire at your local showroom if you need to know whether your new furniture will fit.
specs.Label: Access
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Access
specs.Value: Removeable legs for easy access. Please enquire at your local showroom if you need to know whether your new furniture will fit.

specs.HoverValue: * Also available in depth of 93cm with seat depth of 53cm.
specs.Label: Depth
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Depth
specs.Value: * Also available in depth of 93cm with seat depth of 53cm.

specs.HoverValue: Handmade products may have a variation of up to 3cm.
specs.Label: Sizing
specs.Name: SpecAttribute_Sizing
specs.Value: Handmade products may have a variation of up to 3cm.
